message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $180, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
